A mobile ice cream parlor that offers unique flavors such as lavender honey or passionfruit sorbet.
A vegan burger joint that uses locally sourced ingredients and offers creative toppings such as roasted garlic aioli or truffle fries.
A coffee shop that specializes in artisanal loose-leaf teas and serves them in unique teapot shapes and sizes.
A sandwich shop that offers creative twists on classic sandwiches, such as adding avocado to aBLT or replacing the bread with lettuce wraps.
A gourmet hot dog stand that offers unique toppings such as kimchi slaw or truffle aioli, and uses premium meats such as Kobe beef or wagyu pork.
